quotes.quote: Why waste time proving how great you are, when you could be getting better?
quotes.speaker: Carol Dweck

quotes.quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
quotes.speaker: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
quotes.speaker: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is a result of good work habits.
quotes.speaker: Twyla Tharp
